fulltext:
NGUYEN HUYNH TUONG HOAN 
Address:  
Phone: 
Email: 
Personal information: 
First Name: 
HOAN 
Last Name: 
NGUYEN HUYNH TUONG 
Birth: 
14 – November – 1985 
Sex:  Male 
Marital Status: 
Married 
Professional Summary: 
●
Worked on a lot of large projects regarding banking and securities.  
●
Implemented various web-based (10+ years) and windows based (4+ years) 
applications. 
●
Has 10+ years in Java/JEE development, 4+ years in .NET development, 5+ years in 
Oracle PL/SQL development. 
Technical Summary: 
Java Technologies:  
Java Core,  Java Security, JDBC, Socket and RMI, JSP, Servlet, 
JMS, JSTL,... 
JEE  Frameworks/ 
Libraries: 
Spring, Hibernate, Struts (3+ years), Log4J,... 
Tools: 
SVN,  Eclipse, NetBeans, Visual Studio, Toad for Oracle, PLSQL 
Developer,... 
Platforms: 
Linux, Windows 
Databases: 
Oracle,  MSQL 
Application Servers: 
Apache Tomcat 
Design skills: 
OOA (Object Oriented Analysis) & OOD (Object Oriented 
Design), Design patterns, and UML. 
Others: 
Web services (SOAP, REST), HTML, CSS, Ajax, JavaScript, 
Oracle PL/SQL, Jasper Report, Crystal Report,... 
Work Experience: 
Aug  2013 – Present: Ho Chi Minh City Development Bank (HDBank) – Ho Chi Minh 
City, Vietnam. 
Position: Senior developer 
Tasks/ Achievements: 
●
HDBank Internet Banking:  
▪
Maintained and developed new components, functionalities, both back-end 
and front-end to existing systems: 2FA Authentication, Payments, ... 
▪
Developed gateways for tax payment, customs tax payment, mobile 
recharge/ TopUp,...  
▪
Used technologies: J2EE, Socket, HTML, CSS, Jquery, JCE, Oracle 
PL/SQL,... 
●
HDBank Mobile Banking: 
▪
Designed Framework, Database, Workflows used at the back-end. 
▪
Used technologies: Spring Boot, RestAPI, Microservices. 
●
Interbank electronic payment system – The State Bank Of Viet Nam (SBV) 
▪
Receive/send transactions files from/to SBV. 
▪
Import/ export transactions to/ from Core Banking system. 
▪
Developed web-based applications for monitoring. 
▪
Used technologies: Java, .NET, Crystal Report, Oracle,... 
●
HDBank Card Management: 
▪
Developed a web-based application for daily report/ reconciliation with 
NAPAS (Vietnam National Payment Services): Receive/ import 
transactions report from Napas, compare with data in system and 
export/send the result to NAPAS. 
▪
Developed/ Maintained the IBFT Gateway between NAPAS vs HDBank. 
▪
Used technologies: Java, Tomcat, Oracle... 
●
HDBank – Disbursement settlement system: 
▪
Contacted directly with the partners (MoneyGram, EMQ, Transfast,...) to 
collect requirements. 
▪
Designed framework, database and system. 
▪
Developed application to get settlement files, parse and import into the 
database, generate settlement result files and send to the partners 
automatically. 
▪
Developed web-based applications for monitoring. 
▪
Used technologies: Java, Quartz Scheduler, Oracle, SOAP, PGP,...  
●
HDBank – e-Wallet Gateways: 
▪
Developed gateways between HDBank and some e-Wallet partners: 
WebMoney, VNPTPay, Payoo,... 
▪
Developed auto reconciliation application. 
▪
Used technologies: Java, Quartz Scheduler, REST, SOAP, Oracle,... 
●
Developed some internal banking projects: Services fee auto charging, SMS OTP 
gateway, Auto-scheduler application,... 
April 2011 – Aug 2013: DAI A Commercial Join Stock Bank (DaiABank) – Bien Hoa City, 
Dong Nai Province, Vietnam. 
Position: Senior developer 
Tasks/ Achievements: 
●
Worked in Banking Applications Development Team with 4 other members.  
●
Maintained and developed Internet Banking product.  
●
Developed some internal banking projects. 
Used technologies:  Java, JSP, Servlet, Jasper Report, Tomcat, Javascript/Ajax, HTML, 
Jquery, CSS, Visual Studio, Crystal Report, Oracle, MSQL. 
April 2008 – March  2011: UNICOM Software  -  Ho Chi Minh  City, Vietnam. 
Position: Developer  
Tasks/ Achievements: 
●
Worked in Securities Online Trading Team with 5 other members. 
●
Developed and deployed securities online banking product. 
●
Participated in some company’s outsourced software projects. 
Used technologies: Java, Spring, Hibernate, Struts, Jasper Report, Tomcat, Javascript/Ajax, 
HTML, Jquery, CSS, Oracle. 
Education: 
●
StudiedBachelorofEngineeringatFacultyofInformationTechnology-HoChi
Minh City University of Technology from 2003, graduated in 2008. 
Key skills and Competencies 
●
Good programming ability. 
●
Strong core Java development experience. 
●
Strong knowledge of Data Structures and Algorithms. 
●
More experiences with using and applying Design Patterns. 
●
Goodattroubleshooting,problem-solving,searchingontheInternettofindsolutions
in a little time. 
●
Ability to develop applications by using .NET. 
●
Has experience in Oracle database development.  
●
Ability to react quickly to shifting priorities and meet deadlines. 
●
Ability to work under pressure, effectively independently or as part of a team. 
●
Good communication skills, both verbal and written. 
●
Has intermediate English level.
